item.title: Releasing r2pptx on CRAN
item.description: Installation Simple example Advanced example I’m excited to have the r2pptx package on CRAN! r2pptx is designed to provide a beginner-friendly interface to make Powerpoint presentations in R. It can be a helpful package to use if you often create slide decks that contain tables, plots, or calculations that come from R code. r2pptx is built as a wrapper around officer, and wouldn’t be possible without all of officer developer David Gohel’s hard work.
